title: Game Scoop Episode 629
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Justin Davis, Sam Claiborn, and Mark Medina -- are discussing topics like Elden Ring, Death Stranding Director's Cut, Tiny Tina's Wonderlands, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
